summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Staff Attendance and Payroll Management App. All 21 backend API tests passed. Frontend testing verified login for all roles, QR-based attendance, Bill Submission, Payslip with PDF download, and Attendance Details pages. Fixed Dashboard 'Overtime' to 'Bill Submissions' in Pending Approvals section.

issues: Team stats show '-1 Present' which seems like a calculation issue

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard.jsx was showing 'Overtime' instead of 'Bill Submissions' in Pending Approvals - FIXED
Team Lead dashboard shows '-1 Present' which may need investigation
seed_data_creation: Database seeded via POST /api/seed with users, holidays, and sample payslips
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working: Login (3 roles), QR generation (Team Lead), QR scan button (Employee), Bill Submission, Payslip with PDF download, Attendance Details with year/month selectors. Backend fully tested with pytest. Navigation updated - Bills replaced Overtime in all menus.

employee_view.qr_scan_button: PASS - 'Scan QR & Punch In' button on My Attendance
employee_view.punch_in_button: PASS - Punch In button on dashboard
employee_view.bill_submission: PASS - Submit Expenses button, items list, pending/approved stats
employee_view.payslip: PASS - Shows only settled payslips, PDF download works, full salary breakdown
employee_view.attendance_details: PASS - Year/Month selectors, date-wise records, conveyance tracking

teamlead_view.generate_qr: PASS - Generate QR button with location and conveyance fields
teamlead_view.quick_actions: PASS - View Team Attendance, Manage Leave Requests, Review Bill Submissions

admin_view.dashboard: PASS - Stats, Today's Attendance, Pending Approvals

navigation.overtime_replaced: PASS - Bills replaced Overtime in all role menus
